trans-unit.source: Represents a particular type of data, such as a customer entity or an order entity in a conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un tipo di dati specifico, ad esempio un'entità Customer o un'entità Order, in un modello concettuale.

trans-unit.source: Gets the built-in type kind for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo del tipo incorporato per <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind" /> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind" /> che rappresenta il tipo del tipo incorporato per <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RefType" /> object that references this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RefType" /> che fa riferimento a <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RefType" /> object that references this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RefType" /> che fa riferimento a <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the navigation properties of this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le proprietà di navigazione per <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of type <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection`1" /> that contains the list of navigation properties on this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di tipo <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection`1" /> che contiene l'elenco delle proprietà di navigazione in <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of properties for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.
A collection of type <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection`1" /> that contains the list of properties for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di tipo <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection`1" /> che contiene l'elenco di proprietà per <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" />.
